<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	MACON
	BANK
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<B>
	LONG-TERM CAPITAL APPRECIATION
	PLAN
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: RULE-PAGE -->
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 1PT; BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; WIDTH: 25%">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /RULE-PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 6PT/6PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	2004
	Amendment and Restatement
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 6PT/6PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: RULE-PAGE -->
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 1PT; BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; WIDTH: 25%">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /RULE-PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 1.55PT 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 107%">
	The
	Board of Directors of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; COLOR: #171717; LINE-HEIGHT: 107%">
	M
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 107%">
	acon
	Bank,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; COLOR: #444444; LINE-HEIGHT: 107%">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 107%">
	I
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; COLOR: #2A2A2A; LINE-HEIGHT: 107%">
	n
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 107%">
	c.,
	by resolution dated December 15
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; COLOR: #171717; LINE-HEIGHT: 107%">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 107%">
	2004,
	amends and restates this Long-term Capital Appreciation Plan (&ldquo;Plan&rdquo;) effective as of January
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	1,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 107%">
	2005 in order to establish that all amounts deferred or
	vested after December 31, 2004 shall be governed by the sub-plan (the &ldquo;Sub-plan&rdquo;) attached as E
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; COLOR: #171717; LINE-HEIGHT: 107%">
	x
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 107%">
	hibit
	&ldquo;C&rdquo; hereto. The purpose of the Plan is to provide incentive compensation on a deferred basis for its directors and select
	executive officers. The Plan is not tax-qualified under Section 401 of the Code
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; COLOR: #171717; LINE-HEIGHT: 107%">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 107%">
	and is unfunded and primarily for a select group of management
	or highly compensated employees within the meaning of Section 201(2) of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, as
	amended.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.75PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	ARTICLE
	I
<BR>
<U>
	Definitions
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.9PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	The following
	words and phrases, when used in the Plan with an initial capital letter, shall have the meanings set forth below unless the context
	clearly indicates otherwise.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.65PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	1.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<I>
	&ldquo;Acceptance&rdquo;
</I>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	shall
	mean acceptance, by the Committee, of a Deferral Election Form
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; COLOR: #171717">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	a
	Distribution Election Form, or an Investm
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; COLOR: #171717">
	e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	nt
	Election Form (which acceptance shall be presumed unless, within ten busine
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; COLOR: #171717">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	s
	days of d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; COLOR: #171717">
	e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	livery of a
	Participant&rsquo;s election to a Director, the Committee provides the Participant with a written notice detailing the reasons for its
	rejection).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.25PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	1.2
<I>
	&ldquo;Account&rdquo;
</I>
	shall mean a bookkeeping account maintained by the Bank in the name of each Participant.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 9.5PT/9PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.45PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	1.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<I>
	&ldquo;Affiliate&rdquo;
</I>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	shall mean any &ldquo;parent
	corporation&rdquo; or &ldquo;subsidiary corporation&rdquo; of the Bank, as the terms are defined in Section 424(e) and (f), respectively,
	of the Code.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.35PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	1.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<I>
	&rsquo;&lsquo;Appreciation Percentage&rdquo;
</I>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	shall
	mean the percentage (if any) by which the Book Value appreciates between the date on which the Committee credits a Capital Appreciation
	Right to a Participant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; COLOR: #171717">
	&rsquo;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	s
	Account and the date on which the Participant terminates Service (subject, however, to Section 3.4 hereof).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.5PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	1.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<I>
	&ldquo;Bank&rdquo;
</I>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	shall
	mean M
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; COLOR: #171717">
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	c
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; COLOR: #171717">
	o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; COLOR: #2A2A2A">
	n
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	Bank, Inc.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; COLOR: #171717">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	and
	any successor to its interest.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.1PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	1.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<I>
	&ldquo;Beneficiary&rdquo;
</I>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	shall
	mean the person or persons whom a Participant may designate as the beneficiary of the Participant&rsquo;s Benefits under
	Article II
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; COLOR: #171717">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	and
	shall mean the Participant&rsquo;s estate in the absence of a valid designation. A Participant&rsquo;s election of a
	Beneficiary shall be made on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	Distribution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	Election
	Form, shall be revocable by the Participant during his or her lifetime
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	and
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	effective
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	only upon its Acceptance by the Committee.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.35PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
</FONT>
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1; OPTIONS: NEWSECTION; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: SILVER 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	1
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage143"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	1.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<I>
	&ldquo;Benefits&rdquo;
</I>
	shall mean any and all benefits that accrue under Article II of
	the Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.75PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	1.8
<I>
	&ldquo;Board&rdquo;
</I>
	shall mean the Board of Directors of the Bank.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.3PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	1.9
<I>
	&ldquo;Book Value&rdquo;
</I>
	shall mean the book value of the Bank and any Affiliates, as determined in accordance with Generally
	Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP), provided that the Committee shall have
	the discretion to take into account or to disregard any extraordinary financial events affecting the Bank or an Affiliate.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.55PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	1.10
<I>
	&ldquo;Capital
	Appreciation Right&rdquo;
</I>
	shall mean a credit that the Committee makes to a Participant&rsquo;s Account pursuant to Article II.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.5PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	1.11
<I>
	&ldquo;Change in Control&rdquo;
</I>
	shall mean: (i) the execution of an agreement for the sale of all or a material portion of
	the assets of the Bank; (ii) the execution of an agreement for a merger, consolidation, or other transaction of the Bank whereby
	the Bank is not the surviving entity; (iii) a change of control of the Bank, as defined or determined either by the Bank&rsquo;s primary
	banking regulator or under regulations promulgated by it; (iv)
	the acquisition, directly or indirectly, of the beneficial ownership within the meaning of that term as it is used in Section 13(d)
	of the 1934 Act and the rules and regulations promulgated thereunder) of twenty-five percent (25%) or more of the outstanding voting
	proxies or securities of the Bank by any person, trust, entity, or group; or; (v) during any period of two consecutive years, individuals
	(the &ldquo;Continuing Directors&rdquo;) who at the beginning of such period constitute the Board of Directors of the Bank or its
	mutual holding company (the &ldquo;Existing Board&rdquo;) cease for any reason to constitute at least two-thirds thereof, provided
	that any individual whose election or nomination for election as a member
	of the Existing Board was approved by a vote of at least two-thirds of the Continuing Directors then in office shall be considered
	a Continuing Director. This limitation shall not apply to a transaction in which either the Bank merely converts stock form or
	forms a holding company or up to 30% of any class of securities of the Bank are purchased by a tax-qualified employee stock benefit
	plan of the Bank or an affiliate. The term &ldquo;person&rdquo; refers to an individual or a corporation, partnership,
	trust, bank, joint venture, pool, syndicate, sole proprietorship, unincorporated organization
	or any other form of entity not specifically listed herein.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.15PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	1.12
<I>
	&ldquo;Code&rdquo;
</I>
	shall mean the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.35PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	1.13
<I>
	&ldquo;Committee&rdquo;
</I>
	shall mean any committee that the Board may appoint to administer and effectuate the
	Plan. The Committee shall act only by a majority of its members, and may act through meetings
	or written consents. Notwithstanding the foregoing, the Board may at any time act in lieu of the Committee with respect to any
	action that the Committee may take pursuant to the Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.15PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	1.14
<I>
	&ldquo;Common Stock&rdquo;
</I>
	shall mean
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	common stock, if an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	y
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	,
	of the Bank, but shall mean common stock of a holding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	of the Bank if one is formed for that purpose independently of a Change in Control.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
</P>

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	1.15
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<I>
	&ldquo;D
</I>
</FONT>
<I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; COLOR: #171717">
	efe
</FONT>
</I>
<I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	rrals&rdquo;
</FONT>
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	shall mean any Participant-directed deferrals that occur pursuant to Section
	2.1 hereof.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.1PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	1.16
<I>
	&ldquo;Deferral Election Form&rdquo;
</I>
	shall mean the form attached hereto
	as Exhibit &ldquo;A&rdquo;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.1PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	1.17
<I>
	&ldquo;Director&rdquo;
</I>
	shall mean a member of the Board, or the Board of Directors of an Affiliate.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.1PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	1.18
<I>
	&ldquo;Distribution
	Election Form&rdquo;
</I>
	shall mean the form attached hereto as Exhibit &ldquo;B&rdquo;.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.1PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	1.19
<I>
	&ldquo;Effective Date&rdquo;
</I>
	shall mean July 1, 1998.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.35PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	1.20
<I>
	&ldquo;Employee&rdquo;
</I>
	shall mean any person to whom the Bank or an Affiliate pays
	&ldquo;wages&rdquo; that are reportable to the Internal Revenue Service on Form W-2 (or a successor form thereto).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.2PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	1.21
<I>
	&ldquo;Just Cause&rdquo;
</I>
	shall mean misconduct, breach of fiduciary duty involving personal
	profit, intentional failure to perform stated duties, willful violations of any law, rule
	or regulation (other than traffic violations or similar offenses), or final cease-and-desist orders.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.5PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	1.22
<I>
	&ldquo;Participant&rdquo;
</I>
	shall mean (i) executive officers Stiles, Plemens, Jeffress, Morgan,
	and Brown, (ii) an
	individual who serves as a Director of the Bank on the
	Effective Date, regardless
	of whether or not the Director is an Employee,
	and (ii) any Director or Employee whom the Board specifically selects for participation in
	the Plan after the Effective Date, provided that an Employee shall be eligible for Plan participation
	only if the Employee is a member of a select group of the Bank&rsquo;s management or highly compensated
	employees for purposes of Title I of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, as
	amended from time to time.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 1PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	1.23
<I>
	&ldquo;Plan&rdquo;
</I>
	shall mean this Macon Bank Long-term Capital Appreciation Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.75PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	1.24
<I>
	&ldquo;Plan
	Year&rdquo;
</I>
	shall mean the one-year period that begins each July 1, except the initial Plan Year shall begin on the Effective
	Date and end on June 30, 1999.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.55PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	1.25
<I>
	&ldquo;Service&rdquo;
</I>
	shall mean an individual&rsquo;s service as an Employee or Director, but shall not include service performed as an advisory director
	or director emeritus.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.55PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	1.26
<I>
	&ldquo;Trust&rdquo;
</I>
	shall mean the trust created under the Trust
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.35PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	1.27
<I>
	&ldquo;Trust Agreement&rdquo;
</I>
	shall mean the agreement entered into between the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	Bank
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	and the Trustee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; COLOR: #2D2D2D">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	pursuant
	to the terms hereof.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.2PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	1.28
<I>
	&ldquo;Trustee&rdquo;
</I>
	shall mean the person(s) or entity appointed by the Board pursuant to the Trust Agreement to hold legal title to the Plan Assets
	for the purposes set forth herein.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 1PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	1.29
<I>
	&ldquo;Vested Percentage&rdquo;
</I>
	shall be determined for each Participant by dividing the Participant&rsquo;s actual Years
	of Service by 10; provided that a Participant&rsquo;s Vested Percentage shall automatically accelerate
	to 100% in the event the Participant&rsquo;s Service terminates due to the Participant&rsquo;s
</FONT>
	death or disability (as determined by the Committee), or a Change in Control.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.35PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 3; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: SILVER 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	&nbsp;

	3
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->

</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage145"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	1.30
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<I>
	&ldquo;Year of S
</I>
</FONT>
<I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	e
</FONT>
</I>
<I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	rvice&rdquo;
</FONT>
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	shall mean each full year of a Participant&rsquo;s Service, measured from the
	Effective Date forward; provided that Years of Service in
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
	excess
	of 10 shall be disregarded for this purpose.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.95PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	ARTICLE
	II
<U>
<BR>
	Credits to Accounts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 1PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	2.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<I>
	Deferrals.
</I>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	Each
	Participant may elect, on the Deferral Election Form, to make Deferrals by directing that his or her fees, salary, bonuses, or
	other cash compensation be reduced on a pre-tax basis. Such elections shall (i) be irrevocable until the end of the calendar year
	in which they are made, and (ii) be effecti
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	v
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	e
	on the January 1st following their Acceptance, provided that a Participant may elect to have an election take effect as soon as
	administratively practicable with respect to cash compensation that the Participant may receive in the future and as to which the
	Participant currently has no legal right or claim. As soon as practicable after the end of each pay period, the Bank shall credit
	each Participant&rsquo;s Account with any Deferrals that occurred during the pay period.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	2.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<I>
	Initial Credits.
</I>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	On
	the Effective Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; COLOR: #282828">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	the
	Bank shall credit $4,500 to the account of each Participant who is a Directo
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	r
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	on that date.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.3PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	2.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<I>
	Investment Return on Deferrals.
</I>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	At
	the end of each Plan Year during which a Participant&rsquo;s Account has a positive value
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	the Bank shall credit the average balance of the Participant&rsquo;s Account that
	is attributable to Deferrals and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	I
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	nitial
	Credits under Sectio
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	n
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	2.2
	with an investment return equal to the average return-on-equity achieved by the Bank and its Affiliates for the current fiscal
	year and the two immediately preceding fiscal years. For this purpose, the Committee shall determine return-on-equity in accordance
	with Generally Accepted Accounting Principles, provided that the Committee may in its discretion take into account or disregard
	any extraordinary financial events. In the event of a stock conversion by the Bank, each Participant may elect to h
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	ve
	his or her Account credited, on a prospective basis, with the total return that stockholders receive on Common Stock.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.35PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	2.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<I>
	Capital Appreciation Rights.
</I>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	As
	of the Effective Date, the Bank shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	credit Capital Appreciation
	Rights to the Accounts of Participants according to the following schedule:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 15%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 30%; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<U>
	Participant
</U>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 65%; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<U>
	Capital Appreciation Right
</U>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	Each non-Employee Director
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	E. Stiles
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	R.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	Plemens
<BR>
	S. Jeffress
<BR>
	M. Morgan
<BR>
	B. Brown
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/105% TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 8.75PT 0 5.7PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
	The Committee
	may, in its discretion, make future credits of Capital Appreciation Rights to the Accounts of Participants.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 5PT/5PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.5PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 4; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: SILVER 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	4
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage146"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	2.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<I>
	Termination of Service.
</I>
	The Committee shall determine the Account balance, that is
	payable to a Participant in accordance with Article III, as of the last day of the calendar quarter that coincides with or next
	follows the Participant&rsquo;s termination of Service (or a Change in Control, if earlier). The Participant&rsquo;s Account balance as of
	that date shall equal the sum of-
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.75PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 76.3PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.35IN">
	(i) all Deferrals
	made by the Participant, Initial Credits made pursuant to Section 2.2 hereof, and any earnings credited pursuant to Section 2.3
	hereof, and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.3PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 76.3PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.35IN">
	(ii) the product
	obtained when each of the Participant&rsquo;s Capital Appreciation Rights is multiplied by both the Participant&rsquo;s Vested Percentage and
	the applicable Appreciation Percentage.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.2PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	2.6
<I>
	Earnings
	Credits on Final Account Balances.
</I>
	From the date as of which the Committee determines a Participant&rsquo;s final Account balance
	pursuant to Section 2.5 hereof, the Bank shall credit the Participant&rsquo;s Account with simple interest that shall accrue monthly
	on any unpaid balances at a rate of 8% per annum.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.2PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	ARTICLE
	III
<BR>
<U>
	Distributions from Accounts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	3.1
<I>
	Normal Form and Timing of Distributions.
</I>
	In
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	the absence of a valid Distribution Election pursuant to Section 3 .2 hereof or Section 3
	.1 of the Sub-plan, whichever is applicable, (and subject to Section 3.3 hereof), the Bank shall pay a Participant&rsquo;s Account balance
	in cash, in substantially equal monthly payments over a period of five years; beginning as soon as administratively practicable
	following the last day of the month in which the Committee determines the Participant&rsquo;s final Account balance pursuant to Section
	2.5 hereof.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.15PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	3.2
<I>
	Distribution Elections.
</I>
	Subject to Section 3.3 hereof, a Participant may elect on the Distribution Election Form to have
	his or her final Account balance paid in annual payments over a period of between 5 and 10 years, in a lump sum distribution that
	occurs more than two years after the Participant terminates service, or a combination of these choices. In
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	order to be effective, Acceptance of a Participant&rsquo;s Distribution Election
	Form must occur
<U>
	either
</U>
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	more than one year before the date on which the Participant&rsquo;s Service terminates
	for any reason
<U>
	or
</U>
	(ii) within 30 days of the Participant&rsquo;s initial commencement of Plan participation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; COLOR: #262626">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	or (iii) more than 90 days before the closing of a Change in Control. In
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	the event a Participant files more than one valid Distribution Election Form,
	the most recent valid election shall supersede any and all prior elections. Nevertheless, Beneficiary designations made pursuant
	to executed Election Forms shall be revocable during the Participant&rsquo;s lifetime and a Participant may, by submitting an effective
	superseding Election Form at any time and from time to time, prospectively change the designated Beneficiary and the manner of
	payment to a Beneficiary.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.35PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	3.3
<I>
	Forfeiture.
</I>
	The portion of a Participant&rsquo;s final Account balance that is attributable to Capital Appreciation Rights (as calculated pursuant
	to Section 2.5 (ii) hereof) shall be forfeited immediately if either of the following events occur:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.35PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 76.3PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.35IN">
	(i)
	The Committee determines that the Participant&rsquo;s Service ended, voluntarily or involuntarily, due to Just Cause.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 4.7PT 0 0 5.7PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 4.7PT 0 0 5.7PT">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 5; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: SILVER 1PT SOLID">

<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	5

	&nbsp;

</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 4.7PT 0 0 5.7PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 76.3PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.35IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	(ii)
	Within 24
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	months
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	after terminating Service,
	the Participant becomes an employee, consultant, director, or 10% or more stockholder of a company that provides products that
	compete with those of the Bank or its Affiliates, within 50 miles of any place where the Bank or its Affiliates is doing business
	on the date the Participant&rsquo;s Service terminates.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 1PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	3.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<I>
	Change in Control.
</I>
	In the event of a Change in Control, the Bank and the Participant
	have the right to mutually agree to limit payments that they might consider excess &ldquo;golden parachute payments&rdquo; as defined
	under &sect;&sect;280G and 4999 of the Code. In addition, upon the closing date of a Change in Control: the forfeiture provision
	set forth in Section 3.3(ii) hereof shall lapse and become null and void, each Participant&rsquo;s Vested Percentage shall become 100%,
	and the Appreciation Percentage for each Participant shall be calculated by assuming that the appreciation percentage that occurred
	between the initial credit of a Capital Appreciation Right and the Change in Control continues through date on which the Participant&rsquo;s
	Vested Percentage would have reached 100% pursuant to Section 1.29 hereof.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.35PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	3.5
<I>
	Death Benefits.
</I>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	If
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	a Participant dies before receiving
	all Benefits payable pursuant to Section 3.1, then the vested but unpaid balance of the Participant&rsquo;s Account shall be distributed
	in a lump sum to the Participant&rsquo;s Beneficiary as soon as administratively practicable following the date of the Participant&rsquo;s
	death, provided that a Participant may specify on the Distribution Election Form the distribution period elected therein by the
	Participant.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.6PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	ARTICLE
	IV
<U>
<BR>
	Source of Benefits
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.1PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	4.1
<I>
	General
	Rule.
</I>
	Benefits accumulated under the Plan shall constitute an unfunded, unsecured promise by the Bank to provide such payments
	in the future, as and to the extent such Benefits become payable. Benefits accumulated under the Plan shall be paid from the general
	assets of the Bank, and no person shall, by virtue of this Plan, have any interest in such assets, other than as an unsecured creditor,
	of the Bank. For any Plan Year during which a Trust is maintained, (i) the Trustee shall inform the Committee annually prior to
	the commencement of each Plan Year as to the manner in which such Trust assets shall be invested, and (ii) the Committee shall,
	as soon as practicable after the end of each calendar quarter, provide the Trustee with a schedule specifying the amount of any
	Trust contribution that is attributable to the Participant&rsquo;s Account for purposes only of Section 2.5 of this Plan. The Bank shall
	also, at least annually, provide the Trustee with a schedule specifying the amounts payable to each Participant, and the time for
	making such payments. All interest, dividends, and realized gain/losses on Trust assets will be taxed to the Bank.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.65PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	4.2
<I>
	Trust Funding on Change in Control.
</I>
	In the event of a Change in Control, the Bank shall contribute to the Trust an amount
	sufficient to provide the Trust with assets having an overall value equivalent to the value of the aggregate Account balances under
	the Plan (calculated as though each Participant&rsquo;s Service terminates coincident with the Change
	in Control).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 158.25PT 0 168.95PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: -5.15PT">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 6; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: SILVER 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	6
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage148"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: -5.15PT">
	ARTICLE
	V
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<U>
	Recordkeeping;
	Plan Expenses
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.25PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 10.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
	The Committee
	shall be responsible for maintaining all Accounts, with particular reference to contribution sources and allocating gains and losses
	(at least annually), and shall prepare Account reports for the Participants and the Bank. The Committee may in its discretion appoint
	or remove a third-party recordkeeper. The Bank shall pay all expenses associated with the Plan and the Trust.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.75PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	ARTICLE
	VI
<U>
<BR>
	Assignment
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.55PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 10.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
	Except
	as otherwise expressly provided by this Plan, it is agreed that neither the Participant nor his or her Beneficiary, nor the Participant&rsquo;s
	executors and administrators, heirs, legatees, distributees,
	and any other person or persons claiming any benefits under him or her under this Plan, shall have any right to assign, transfer,
	pledge, hypothecate, sell, transfer, alienate and encumber
	or otherwise convey the right to receive any Benefits hereunder, which Benefits and
	the rights thereto are expressly declared to be nontransferable.
	The right to receive Benefits under this Plan shall likewise not be subject to execution, attachment, garnishment, sequestration
	or similar legal, equitable or other process to the benefit of the Participant&rsquo;s creditors. Any attempted assignment, transfer,
	pledge, hypothecation
	or other disposition of the Participant&rsquo;s rights to receive Benefits under this Plan or the levy of any attachment,
	garnishment or similar process thereupon, shall be null and void and without effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.25PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	ARTICLE
	VII
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<U>
	No
	Retention of Services
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.9PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 10.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
	The Benefits
	payable under this Plan shall be independent of, and in addition to, any other compensation payable by the Bank to a Participant,
	whether in the form of fees, bonus, retirement income under employee benefit plans sponsored or maintained by the Bank or otherwise.
	This Plan shall not be deemed to constitute a contract of employment between the Bank and any Participant.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 1PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	ARTICLE VIII
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<U>
	Rights
	of Participants and Beneficiaries
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.25PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 10.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
	The
	rights (if any) of Participants and their Beneficiaries under this Plan shall be solely those rights
	of unsecured creditors of the Bank.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.7PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	ARTICLE IX
<BR>
<U>
	Reorganization
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.9PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 10.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
	The
	Bank agrees that it will not merge or consolidate with any other corporation or organization,
	or permit its business activities to be taken over by any other organization, unless and until the succeeding or continuing corporation
	or other organization shall expressly assume the rights
	and obligations of the Bank herein set forth. The Bank further agrees that it will not cease
	its business activities or terminate its existence,
	other than as heretofore set forth in this Article IX, without having made adequate provision for the fulfillment of its obligation
	hereunder.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 1PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 7; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: SILVER 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	&nbsp;

	7

</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage149"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	ARTICLE
	X
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<U>
	Amendment
	and Termination
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.25PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 10.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
	The
	Board may amend or terminate the Plan at any time, provided
	that no such amendment or termination shall, without the written consent of an affected Participant, alter or impair any vested
	rights of the Participant under the Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.25PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	ARTICLE
	XI
<BR>
<U>
	State Law
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.6PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 10.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	This
	Plan shall be construed and governed in all respects under and by the laws of the State of North Carolina, except to the extent
	preempted by federal law
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	. If any provision of this Plan shall be held by a court of competent
	jurisdiction to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions hereof shall continue to be fully effective.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.2PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: -1.4PT">
	ARTICLE
	XII
<U>
<BR>
	Headings; Gender
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.2PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 10.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
	Headings and
	subheadings in this Plan are inserted for convenience and reference only and constitute no part of this Plan. This Plan shall be
	construed, where required, so that the masculine gender includes the feminine.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 1PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT/101% TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0.05PT">
	ARTICLE
	XIII
<U>
<BR>
	Interpretation of the Plan
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.8PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 10.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
	The Committee
	shall have sole and absolute discretion to administer, construe, and interpret the Plan, and the decisions of the Committee shall
	be conclusive and binding on all affected parties, unless such decisions are arbitrary and capricious.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 1PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT/101% TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: -0.65PT">
	ARTICLE
	XIV
<BR>
<U>
	Disputes; Legal Fees
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.65PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	14.1
<I>
	Generally.
</I>
	Any controversy or claim that arises under this Plan and cannot be settled by the parties shall be addressed solely in the
	federal or state courts located in Franklin, North Carolina, or in the closest jurisdiction thereto if no state or federal court
	exists in Franklin at the time of such review.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.5PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	14.2
<I>
	Reimbursement of
	Legal Fees.
</I>
	In the event that any dispute arises between a Participant and the Bank as to the terms or interpretation of this
	Plan, whether instituted by formal legal proceedings or otherwise, including any action that the Participant takes to enforce
	the terms of this Plan or to defend against any action taken by the Bank or an Affiliate, the Participant shall be reimbursed
	for all costs and expenses, including reasonable attorneys&rsquo; fees, arising from such dispute, proceedings or actions, provided
	that the Participant shall obtain a final judgment or settlement substantially in favor of the Participant either in a court of
	competent jurisdiction or in binding arbitration under the rules of the American Arbitration Association or in a written settlement
	of the dispute. Such reimbursement shall be paid within ten (10) days of Participant&rsquo;s furnishing to the Bank written evidence,
	which may be in the form, among other things, of a canceled check or receipt, of any costs or expenses incurred by the Participant.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.2PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 5.05PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	14.3
<I>
	Ind
</I>
</FONT>
<I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; COLOR: #1C1C1C">
	e
</FONT>
</I>
<I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	mnification.
</FONT>
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	To the maximum exten
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; COLOR: #1C1C1C">
	t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	allowed by law, the Bank shall indemnify each member of the Committee and
	each Trustee who is a Director or Employee for any loss arising from their actions under the Plan and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	Trust
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	;
	provided that such indemnification shall not occur for actions that constitute Just Cause.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.6PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	ARTICLE
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	XV
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<U>
	Duration
	of Plan
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.9PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 10.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
	Unless
	terminated earlier in accordance with Article X, this Plan
	shall remain in effect during the term of service of the Participants
	and until all Benefits payable hereunder have been made.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 10.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 10.1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
</B>
</P>

</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 6PT/6PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 6.1PT 0 72.9PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<B>
	AGREEMENT
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2A2A2A">
	,
</FONT>
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	made this___ day of________
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<I>
	,
</I>
</FONT>
<U>
	20
</U>
	__
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<I>
</I>
</FONT>
	by and between
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<B>
	_____________
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	(the
	&ldquo;Participant&rdquo;) and Macon Bank. Inc. (the Bank&rdquo;),
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.75PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 6.1PT 0 72.9PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<B>
	WHEREAS,
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	the Bank has established the Macon Bank Long-term Capital Appreciation Plan (the &ldquo;Plan&rdquo;),
	and the Participant is eligible to participate in said Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 1PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 109.6PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<B>
	NOW
	THEREFORE,
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	it is mutually agreed as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 6.1PT 0 72.9PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	1.
</FONT>
	The Participant, by the execution hereof, agrees to participate in the Plan upon the terms and conditions set forth therein,
	and, in accordance therewith, elects to defer the receipt of:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.65PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	____
	%
</FONT>
	of the Participant&rsquo;s base salary, director&rsquo;s fees, and/or retainers.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.9PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	____
	% of
	any additional cash compensation that the Participant may receive.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.2PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 1.55PT 0 0 72.15PT">
	Unless the Participant
	checks this space ___ thereby designating the next January
	1st as this election&rsquo;s effective date,
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	this
	election will supersede any prior election and will take effect as soon as practicable hereafter (but only with respect to future
	compensation as to which the Participant has no current legal right or claim through the rending of services).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.15PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 12.6PT 0 71.45PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
	2.
	This election will continue in force until either the effective date of a superseding election by the Participant,
	or until the Participant terminates service with the Bank, or until the Plan is terminated
	by appropriate corporate action, whichever shall first occur.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.35PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 10.4PT 0 70.7PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<B>
	IN
	WITNESS WHEREOF,
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	the parties hereto have hereunto set their hands the day and year first
	above-written.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 10.4PT 0 70.7PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<U>

</U>
	. The Participant, by the execution
	hereof, agrees to participate in the Plan upon the terms and conditions set forth therein,
	and, in accordance therewith, elects to have his or her Account distributed as follows:
</P>

	&nbsp;

	[You may choose a number between 2 and 10.]
</I>
</FONT>
</TD>

	2.
<U>
	Timing of Payment
</U>
	.
	Payment of a Participant&rsquo;s first monthly installment from his or her Account shall occur as soon as administratively practicable
	after the Committee determines the Participant&rsquo;s Final Account balance, unless the Participant elects to defer commencing distributions
	until --
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 6.35PT 0 59.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	accordance with the payment schedule selected in paragraphs 1&nbsp;&nbsp;and 2 hereof (with payments made as though the Participant survived to collect all benefits, and as though the Participant terminated service on the date of his or her death, if payments had not already begun)

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: SILVER 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	&nbsp;

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	2
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage153"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 3.2PT 25.7PT 0 9.75PT; TEXT-INDENT: 35.3PT">
	4.
<U>
	Designation of Beneficiary
</U>
	. In the event of the Participant&rsquo;s death before he or she has collected all of the benefits payable
	under the Plan, the Participant hereby directs that any survivorship benefits payable under Article III of the Plan be distributed
	to the beneficiary or beneficiaries designated under subparagraphs a and b of this paragraph in the manner elected pursuant to
	paragraph 3 above:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.25PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/106% TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 36.5PT 0 8.3PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
	a.
<U>
	Primary Beneficiary
</U>
	. The Participant hereby designates the person(s) named below to be his or her primary beneficiary and
	to receive the balance of any unpaid benefits under the Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.2PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">

<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.7PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 1.55PT 16.85PT 0 7.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	b. Contingent Beneficiary.
	In the event that the primary beneficiary or beneficiaries named above are not living at the time of the Participant&rsquo;s death,
	the Participant hereby designates the following person(s) to be his or her contingent beneficiary for purposes of the Plan:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 1PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">

</FONT>
</TD>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	Mailing&nbsp;Address
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28%; BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-RIGHT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-TOP: 1.95PT; PADDING-LEFT: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM">

	Death Benefit
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">

<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.3PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/108% TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 1.55PT 13.6PT 0 6.15PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	5.
<U>
	Effect of Election
</U>
	. The elections made in paragraphs I and 2 hereof shall become irrevocable on the earlier of the Participant&rsquo;s
	death, (2) the date one year before the Participant first becomes entitled to receive a distribution under Article III of the Plan,
	and (3) the date 90 days before a Change in Control. The Participant may, by submitting an
	effective superseding Distribution Election Form at any time and from time to time, prospectively change the beneficiary designation
	and the manner of payment to a Beneficiary. Such elections shall, however, become irrevocable upon the Participant&rsquo;s death.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.6PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/103% TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 14.75PT 0 6.15PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
	6.
<U>
	Mutual
	Commitments
</U>
	. The Bank agrees to make payment of all amounts due the Participant in accordance with the terms of the Plan and
	the elections made by the Participant herein. The Participant agrees to be bound by the terms of the Plan, as in effect on the
	date hereof or properly amended hereafter.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/102% TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 3.65PT 3.5PT 0 10.5PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">

	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/102% TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 3.65PT 3.5PT 0 10.5PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">

<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	MACON BANK
<BR>
	AMENDED AND RESTATED
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	LONG-TERM CAPITAL APPRECIATION PLAN
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.75PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	2005 Sub-Plan
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Applicable
	to Compensation Deferred or
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Vested
	After December 31, 2004
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 9.5PT/9PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<U>
	PURPOSE
	AND SCOPE
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.8PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 4.65PT 0 10.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
	This
	sub-plan (the &ldquo;Sub-plan&rdquo;) hereby incorporates
	the terms of the Macon Bank Long&bull; Term Capital Appreciation Plan (the &ldquo;Plan&rdquo;) by reference, subject to the limited
	modifications set forth below. Terms within the Sub-plan that begin with initial capital letters shall have the particular defined
	meaning set forth herein or in the Plan, unless the context clearly indicates otherwise. This Sub-plan shall apply to compensation
	that is deferred pursuant to the terms below or that vests on or after January 1, 2005. No provision
	of this Sub-plan shall apply to Compensation that was deferred and vested on or before December 31, 2004. References within the
	Plan to Accounts shall not apply to amounts deferred or vested under this Sub-plan after December 31, 2004, and references herein
	to Accounts shall not apply to Accounts under the Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.1PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	ARTICLE
	I
<U>
<BR>
	Definitions
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.2PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 4.65PT 0 10.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
	The
	following words and phrases, when used in the Plan with an initial capital letter,
	shall have the meanings set forth below unless the context clearly indicates otherwise.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 4.65PT 0 10.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
	1.1
<I>
	&ldquo;Change in Control&rdquo;
</I>
	shall mean any of the following, subject to the Committee&rsquo;s absolute discretion to
	interpret this definition in a manner that conforms with the requirements of Section 409A of the Code and associated regulations:
	(i) the execution of an agreement for the sale of all or a material portion of the assets of the Bank; (ii) the execution of an
	agreement for a merger, consolidation, or other transaction of the Bank whereby
	the Bank is not the surviving entity; (iii) a change of
	control of the Bank, as defined or determined either by the Bank&rsquo;s primary banking regulator or under regulations promulgated
	by it; (iv) the acquisition, directly or indirectly, of
	the beneficial ownership within the meaning of that term as it is used in Section 13(d) of the 1934 Act and the rules and regulations
	promulgated thereunder) of twenty-five percent (25%) or more of the outstanding voting proxies or securities of the Bank by any
	person, trust, entity, or group; or; (v) during any period
	of two consecutive years, individuals (the &ldquo;Continuing
	Directors&rdquo;) who at the beginning of such period constitute the Board of Directors of the Bank or its mutual holding company
	(the &ldquo;Existing Board&rdquo;) cease for any reason to constitute at least two-thirds thereof, provided that any individual
	whose election or nomination for election as a member of the Existing Board was approved by a vote of at least two-thirds of the
	Continuing Directors then in office shall be considered a Continuing Director. This limitation shall not apply to a transaction
	in which either the Bank merely converts stock form or forms a holding company or
	up to 30% of any class of securities of the Bank are purchased by a tax-qualified employee
	stock benefit plan of the Bank or an affiliate. The term &ldquo;person&rdquo; refers to an individual or a corporation,
	partnership, trust, bank, joint
	venture, pool, syndicate, sole proprietorship, unincorporated
	organization or any other form of entity not specifically
	listed herein.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.05PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 190.6PT 0 196.85PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 2.5PT">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 15; OPTIONS: NEWSECTION; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: SILVER 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	1
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage156"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	ARTICLE
	II
<U>
<BR>
	Credits to Accounts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.4PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 4.65PT 0 10.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36.7PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	2.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<I>
	Deferrals.
</I>
	Each Participant may elect, on the Deferral Election Form
	attached hereto as Exhibit &ldquo;D&rdquo;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT; COLOR: #2D2D2D">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	to
	make Deferrals by directing that his or her fees, salary, bonuses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	or
	other cash compensation be reduced on a pre-tax basis. Such elections shall (i) be irrevocable until the end of the calendar year
	in which they are made, and (ii) be effective on the January 1st following their Acceptance, provided that a Participant who is
	newly eligible to participate in the Plan may elect within thirt
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	y
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	(30)
	days of first becoming eligible to participate to defer cash compensation earned after the Acceptance of the applicable Deferral
	Election Form. As soon as practicable after the end of each pay period, the Bank shall credit each Participant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	&rsquo;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	s
	Account with any Deferrals that occurred during the pay period.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	ARTICLE
	III
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 167.3PT 0 174.45PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5PT">
<U>
	Distributions
	from Accounts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.65PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 8.85PT 0 8.45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">
	3.1
<I>
	Distribution Elections.
</I>
	At the time a Participant elects to defer compensation pursuant to Section 2.1, subject to Section
	3.3 of the Plan, the Participant shall elect on the Distribution Election Form attached hereto as Exhibit &ldquo;E&rdquo; to have
	his or her final Account balance paid in annual payments over a period of between 5 and 10 years, in a lump sum distribution that
	occurs more than two years after the Participant terminates service, or a combination of these choices. Such elections shall apply
	to the portion of the Participant&rsquo;s Account that is attributable to compensation deferred under the applicable Deferral Election
	Form, but may be changed through Acceptance of one or more subsequent elections that in each case (i) are delivered to the Committee
	at least one year before the date on which distributions are otherwise scheduled to commence pursuant to the Participant&rsquo;s
	current election, and (ii) defer the commencement of distributions
	by at least five (5) years from the originally scheduled commencement date. Nevertheless, Beneficiary designations made pursuant
	to executed Election Forms shall be revocable during the
	Participant&rsquo;s lifetime and a Participant may, by submitting an effective superseding Election Form at any time and from time to
	time, prospectively change the designated Beneficiary and the manner of payment to a Beneficiary.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.1PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 8.4PT 0 5.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 38.15PT">
	3.2
<I>
	Change in Control.
</I>
	In the event of a Change in Control, the Bank and the Participant have the right to mutually agree to
	limit payments that they might consider excess &ldquo;golden parachute payments&rdquo; as defined under &sect;&sect;280G and 4999
	of the Code to the extent not inconsistent with the provisions of Code Section 409A and associated regulations. In addition, upon
	the closing date of a Change in Control: the forfeiture provision set forth in Section 3.3(ii) of the Plan shall lapse and become
	null and void, each Participant&rsquo;s Vested Percentage shall
	become 100%, and the Appreciation Percentage for each Participant shall be calculated by assuming that the appreciation percentage
	that occurred between the initial credit of a Capital Appreciation Right and the Change in Control continues through date on which
	the Participant&rsquo;s Vested Percentage would have reached 100% pursuant to Section 1.29 of the Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 3.55PT 6.2PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 16; VALUE: 1 -->

	WHEREAS,
</B>
	the
	Bank has established the Macon Bank Long-term Capital Appreciation Plan (the &ldquo;Plan&rdquo;), and the Participant is eligible
	to participate in said Plan.

</B>
	it is mutually
	agreed as follows:

<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.35PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT/97% TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 9.25PT 0 6.6PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 37.45PT">

	By the execution hereof, the Participant agrees to participate in the Plan upon the terms and conditions set forth therein, and,
	in accordance therewith, make the elections set forth herein effective -

<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.8PT 0 0">

	January 1st that follows Acceptance of this Deferral Election
	Form and the corresponding Distribution Election Form.

<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1.5IN; TEXT-INDENT: -30PT">
	____ on the first day of the next calendar month,
	but only if this election occurs within the 30-day period after the Participant first become eligible for Plan participation (NOTE:
	only newly elected directors or newly eligible officers may choose this option).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.35PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 11.5PT 0 6.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">

	Participant agrees to participate in the Plan upon the terms and conditions set forth therein,
	and, in accordance therewith, elects to defer the receipt of:

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	of the Participant&rsquo;s base salary, director&rsquo;s fees, and/or retainers.

	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1.5IN; TEXT-INDENT: -30PT">
	____ % of any additional
	cash compensation that the Participant may receive.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.35PT 0 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	the Participant, or until the Participant terminates service with the Bank, or until the Plan

	Distribution Election Form
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 6PT/6PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0.15PT 0 0">

<!-- FIELD: RULE-PAGE -->

<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">

<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
